name: Windermere Property Management
address: 32785 State Rte 20 Suite #2, Oak Harbor, WA 98277

reviews.author: Dad tv
reviews.review: Where to begin? I've been at the same residence for The last 5 years going on six Windermere has been a help up since day one. After covid times hit real hard when paydays were a miss for a year the awesome staff helped and encourage me to

reviews.author: Andrew Cook
reviews.review: I made an appointment in August with Windermere to come look at my home in Lynden that is for rent. They never bothered to show up to the appointment or call me back. Its obvious they dont care about us little people that only have one

ownerResponse.text:
Hi Andrew,
We are very sorry to hear this happened. Please email us at properties@rentalsbywindermere.com or call us at (360)733-7944 and let us know who you had spoken  More

reviews.author: lochlan roberts
reviews.review: Windermere has been very solid as far as rental companies go! They respond quickly to maintenance requests and reply to emails promptly! Ive personally rented through them for 6 years and never found a reason to change rental companies!

reviews.author: Bandhul Mishra
reviews.review: I rented an apartment through Windermere last year. I was very pleased with the service they provided. They were professional, helpful, and quick to respond to any questions or concerns I had. They made the entire process of renting an

reviews.author: Ian Krause
reviews.review: From a Realtor's perspective Windermere has always been very professional. I have worked with Brandy specifically, and she was great.

ownerResponse.text:
Thank you for your review and sharing your experience!
Best regards,
Windermere Property Management

reviews.author: Jw
reviews.review: Very weird way they go about things I shouldve read the reviews before. They indeed make you apply non refundable $45 fee to VIEW the unit before they do anything with your application, and I assume dont do a holding fee while looking

ownerResponse.text:
Hello,
We apologize to hear that you had a negative experience. 
Please note the policy of applying before a viewing a unit was a COVID procedure  More

reviews.author: Brittany Fuller
reviews.review:
Our experience renting from Windermere was terrible, to say the least.

- Either communication between employees is completely nonexistent, or they

reviews.author: Br Carr
reviews.review: I bought a house in Wispering meadows they run the HOA, They are the worst. They want to control everything, rude, no communication or call back. They want to know everything about you, your kids, your pets, your vehicles. Might as well

ownerResponse.text:
Thank you for your feedback. We will pass this information on to Windermere Association Management. 
Thank you,  More

reviews.author: Rose Larson
reviews.review: The staff is awesome! They are so kind and helpful and made the move in process easy. They were able to answer all my questions or direct me to someone who could. Great experience!

reviews.author: D. Marie Williamson
reviews.review: WA State Human Rights Commission has reached out to your office on behalf of myself, HUD, and most importantly, my daughter.

ownerResponse.text:
We apologize to see you had a negative experience. Please contact our office so that we may better assist you and your rental goals.
Thank you kindly,
Windermere Property Management

reviews.author: Isaac Lozier
reviews.review: WORST RENTAL AGENCY I HAVE EVER HAD TO DEAL WITH. I lived under them for three years and this is not an exaggeration, the agency does not care about your health or well being, only your money. Maintenence requests go unanswered for months

ownerResponse.text:
Hi Isaac,
Our system shows that you have not been a tenant with us before. Please contact our office with more details to work it this out.  More

reviews.author: Kayli Robles
reviews.review: They're great.  Their customer service is super helpful, and seriously knowledgeable about the apartments they list.  I just wish they had more properties available, because I never am able to find a place through them and always end up on

reviews.author: Dawn Day
reviews.review: We have rented from a few large property management companies over the past 30 years. Hands down we have had nothing but excellent service and professionalism from the staff at Windermere. We have enjoyed a few properties with this company

reviews.author: Martin Valentino
reviews.review: I paid a nonrefundable $45 to view an apartment and was never scheduled for a showing. They make you pay for a showing. I am renting thru Windermere & I paid a double deposit to rent, yet I cannot rent any other properties from them with a

ownerResponse.text:
Hi Martin,
Our system does not show you are a tenant, applicant, or prospect with us at the Bellingham office. Please contact us so that we may work this out.  More

reviews.author: kathrine wiles
reviews.review: I am really happy with Windermere they have been very good to me, friendly.  Never any problems.  Been renting from them for 13yrs now

reviews.author: McKenzie
reviews.review: Rented a three bedroom on Ashley Street for two years. The place itself was okay, though prone to mold and the windows did not close properly (they came with dowel rods to put in the tracks since they wouldnt lock). We filed maintenance

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for your feedback. Your concerns are important to us and we value our customers. Please contact our office so we can address your experience directly.

reviews.author: Kerstin Martin
reviews.review: Worst customer service. Windermere property management made a mistake and listed our condo for rent on Zillow, but our condo has never been for rent and we never worked with Windermere. They manage our neighbors condo and probably used the

reviews.author: Christopher Lee
reviews.review: My property manager was Madison and she was available when I needed to get something fix or looked into. Neighbors being loud she was on it with notices, parking violations in assigned spots she was there contacting the residents. No place

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for your feedback! We appreciate our tenants!

reviews.author: Stephanie Richstein
reviews.review: I have had the best rental experience with Windermere Property Management. They are always so responsive to my concerns. Appliances within the home were replaced in a timely manner. I feel confident and comfortable with them having my

reviews.author: Autumn Rifenbury
reviews.review: I started leasing with windermere in september this year, and have had a horrible experience with the people working for windermere. Not only am I placed on hold for 45 plus minutes anytime I show up at the office with concerns, but then I

reviews.author: Ellie Young
reviews.review: Update: since posting this review I want to add that the staff at Windermere was extremely friendly and helpful in the process of trying to find another rental property. I am not going to remove the previous review as I think it is

reviews.author: Dragos Pop
reviews.review: I'm not one to write reviews but after reading some of the ones already posted for this Windermere branch I figured this place needed some justice so here goes my review. Tonya found us a gorgeous place in a market that is overpriced and

reviews.author: Morgan B
reviews.review: I've been renting with Windermere for over a year now and I really liked it to begin with. However the lack of communication about changes has driven me absolutely crazy. The rent hikes they've been putting into place have been crazy as

reviews.author: Abby Morgan
reviews.review: The staff here have been wonderful to work with. Kind, timely, and professional service has made renting from them pleasant and easy!! Ashley (our property manager) has been AMAZING. Shes available at a moments notice for questions and

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for your feedback. We appreciate our tenants!

reviews.author: J Senechal
reviews.review: My husband and I were co-signers on an apartment that our daughter rented in Bellingham while she attended Western Washington University.  The unit was older and  I had some concerns about her living there but it was where the girls wanted

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for your review! We value our clients to have a good experience working with us, and greatly appreciate your feedback.

reviews.author: John Fryer
reviews.review: They are always very nice and I really like the positive attitude that they have.

reviews.author: Glittery Fab
reviews.review: Windemere came in and took over when our complex was sold this spring. We had Son-Rise who I wish we still had. Windermere does not respond to emails, concerns, and failed to change the trash pick up to their name (our lease has WSG

reviews.author: Full Moon
reviews.review: I had such a bad experience with Windermere. My roommate and I found an affordable but old apartment near Western Washington University that needed a lot of repairs like; fixing the balcony doors, the window sill in one of the bedrooms

reviews.author: Hannah Johnson
reviews.review: My property manager was Tonya Wiley. I am writing this review not only on behalf of Windermere, but Tonya as well. She treated me so well from the very start. When I moved back here it was so hard to find a place especially in our price

reviews.author: Travis Priest
reviews.review: They are a middle man company 100% in it for the money. Dealing directly with landlord would be and was more effective and better service. We had to pay a double deposit to move in to our place and half of that was taken away after moving

reviews.author: Rachel Silves
reviews.review: I am the owner of a condo at one of the properties that they manage. We have had so many issues with Windermere, most of them involving the property manager not contacting us or responding to emails and phone calls. The icing on the cake

reviews.author: Hannah Dunn
reviews.review: Windermere has very poor management, and randomly expected all tenants to pay $7000 grand during the worse time of the pandemic. This has caused many to sell their homes and move elsewhere.

reviews.author: Mason Cone
reviews.review: If you can absolutely help it, do not lease from Windermere! You should exhaust every other option before settling with them. And absolutely DO NOT LEASE AN APARTMENT AT 2300 DOUGLAS. These apartments are outrageously expensive, and the

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for your feedback. Your concerns are important to us and we value our customers. Please contact our office so we can address your experience directly.

reviews.author: Anthony Jirnov
reviews.review: These people are literally thieves. They dont care about anyone, your apartment or your property. They will never get back to you if you reach out and they simply care about getting your money at the end of the day. Low-life modern day thieves behind a desk. Enjoy the money you stole from my family. Worthless.

reviews.author: Stephen Matthes
reviews.review: Tonya was the absolute best property manager I have ever had. She always called me back right away and was on top of things. Very friendly, helpful and always assisted me with any issues I had at my apartment. I highly recommend Windermere

reviews.author: Keaton Martin
reviews.review: Property managers are unaware of any contractor activity inside units and buildings, have horrendous response times, and poor-to-terrible customer service. Office personnel and professionalism are much better, but can't help with real

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for your feedback, your concerns are important to us and we value our customer service. Please contact our office so we can address your experience directly.

reviews.author: Finn Mize
reviews.review: Windermere is so helpful with information and the like. if you CALL they try to help. Getting keys is pretty easy as well. HOWEVER...

reviews.author: Abi Weber
reviews.review: Decided to charge me $1200 for a carpet-cleaned bright and shiny apartment when I moved out. When I lived there, took months to get a new furnace after mine was shot and the floor was so cold my toes would go numb.

reviews.author: Britt Connell
reviews.review: (Vantage apartments) No kitchen or bedroom lights worked when we moved in and it took them a whole year to fix them. The side door to the building never works with the key fob. The heat in the lobby has never worked. And they call this luxury living. What a joke.

reviews.author: Frances Dillinger
reviews.review: Listen to the one star reviews !! This place does not care about their tenants.  I lived in a building with windows as old as the building and paid way more for heat in the winter than I should have and they kept saying they were going to

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for your feedback. Your concerns are important to us and we value our customers. Please contact our office so we can address your experience directly.

reviews.author: A. G.
reviews.review: Make sure you take pictures before and as you leave your rental place with Windermere Property Management.

reviews.author: Aimee C.
reviews.review: We had a good experience with Windermere. We received our security deposit back and they always answered our questions/concerns. The property we rented was very nice and we could pay our rent online.

reviews.author: Jeremiah Franks
reviews.review: Worst ran company I've ever experienced. I would be ashamed to be apart of it. Just terrible experiences trying to get application through then finally got approved after talking with lead manager. Told to use online portal for maintenance

ownerResponse.text: We appreciate your feedback and would like to address your concern. Customer satisfaction is important to us. Please contact our office to handle your complaint. Thank you

reviews.author: Inoo Jun
reviews.review: Moved in with three adult family members. House was brand new (still getting finished when we signed the lease, couldn't move in for a week) but had mud under the stove, scuffs throughout the house, ect...

reviews.author: Violet D'Lyla Love
reviews.review: Filled out an application only to waste my money and time. I was told I need a cosigner who makes 7,500 per mo for a 1,500 apartment. I am currently renting from them and tried to switch to a different unit. They scam, discriminate and landlords don't care about keeping their tenants safe..at all..

reviews.author: 1One Love
reviews.review: My 2 toddlers locked me out when I stepped out on the front porch. No shoes, or phone. They would absolutely not help unlock the door. If they were going to help it was going to be a $150 fee. They don't care about you.

reviews.author: Hannah Tanha
reviews.review: Just had the WORST experience. I am a renter of the same condo for over two years and never missed a payment. They have all of mine and my husband's contact info on file. The only way we use to enter our condo is through the garage and

reviews.author: Alex kuksenko
reviews.review: We moved around a lot. This is the first time I actually have to rate my experience. We moved into a new unit they built. Place was still settling and a few cracks developed. They charged us for that. Then when I tried to dispute it, they

ownerResponse.text: We would love to hear you feedback and directly assist you. We value our clients and your experience with us. Please contact our office regarding your complaint.

reviews.author: danielle (d505)
reviews.review: They raised my rent 64% over the last 3 years. I started out paying $1600 in 2018 and as of Sept 1 2021 it will be $2500, plus $150 for w/s/g. This last raise was $650, during a global pandemic and during a housing bottleneck. Purely money

reviews.author: N T
reviews.review: Perhaps they are useful to the landlord, but as a renter they are unresponsive and evasive at the point approaching dishonesty. We've been waiting a month for a reply on issues with our rental.

reviews.author: Dame Caldwell
reviews.review: Do not rent or do business with these people. Property manager is constantly out of the office and never gets back with you. Maintenance is told tenants are too needy when it comes to fixing anything. When they do "attempt" to fix

reviews.author: Dana Sanders
reviews.review: I was a senior at WWU when I leased through Windermere.  My roommate and I had a 3 bedroom unit that was fairly old and worn (which is expected for a college town) but nothing was too broken or had any major problems.

reviews.author: Lori P
reviews.review: Sandy from Windermere Property Management set up an appointment to come to view my rental unit in the Columbia neighbourhood.  Very unfortunate that she was a 'no show' and when I called her office I was told she was running late for a

reviews.author: Lyndee Sheehan
reviews.review: I've never dealt with such an unprofessional property management company in my life. I'm surprised their rating isn't lower.  I moved out of their rental 6 weeks ago and am still waiting for my security deposit back. Everytime I talk to

ownerResponse.text: We value our tenants and want you to have a good experience working with us. Please contact our office so that we can address your situation. Thank you

reviews.author: harlow friday
reviews.review: Absolutely horrible. I had a year-long lease and contract with them, when they decided to cancel our contract effective immediately, after we became aware that all parties hadn't signed the lease agreement and there was a cat with claws

reviews.author: TheRaintree46
reviews.review: I could write paragraphs. This company was acting like a predator against disabled and section 8 tenants. Its been a nightmare. They've ruined my handmade business and were breaking in stole $4000 worth of stuff in over a year just because

ownerResponse.text: While we at Windermere Management empathize with your situation, we are unable to pay you the unfounded small claims action that you filed against us. The judge clearly informed you that there was no basis for your claims of theft from your  More

reviews.author: zac BEYER
reviews.review: Windermere property management wow! I won't say names but the property manager could care less about me or the property. She ignores emails and maintenance concerns, it took 4 weeks to get my ceiling fan fixed, last time I checked it was

reviews.author: Ian Campbell
reviews.review: My best friend's family and I rented from Windermere for the duration of a ten month lease that just ended, and I have never had such a positive experience with a property management company. Bethany in particular has been extremely kind

reviews.author: Jackson Holt
reviews.review: Not once, not twice, but on THREE SEPARATE OCCASIONS NOW, we've parked in the windermere parking lot, and all of three times somebody has been tampering with our vehicles. Mine was broken into twice, and my friend literally had their WHEEL

reviews.author: Debbie Martin
reviews.review: Doug and Lynn Wight are absolutely amazing people.. as are their office staff . Everyone is so kind and hardworking, making sure that everything is taken care of asap .  They definitely make you feel like family .

reviews.author: A N
reviews.review: During the application process, they have been absolutely amazing. Windermere Property Management has helpful, patient, kind, and respectful employees (at least while assisting over the phone). I will gladly post another review after the end of the lease.

reviews.author: Rebecca Francisco
reviews.review: Great business. Been the best during this Pandemic Top notch. No pestering. Even though my motorhome is older, less pleasing to look at, the owner has always helped, made me feel welcome and overall very friendly.

reviews.author: John Nymoen
reviews.review: Of all the property management companies I've done work for, none care less about quality than these guys. I've had owners of houses managed by them that live in a community and the owners wanted us to do the work. But nope Windermere wants

reviews.author: V Savage
reviews.review: My husband and I wanted to find renters for our home in Ferndale. My sister recommended Tonya Wiley. It was the end of October, which is a very tough time of year to find renters. But Tonya took photos, interviewed me so she could meet my

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for your review! We greatly appreciate your feedback and your business with us.

reviews.author: Kimberley Slavens
reviews.review: This business is highly unethical in regards to the property it chooses to manage. My son and his friend got into a lease at 800 20th Street, From October to January we attempted to talk with Windermere about concerns with toxic mold, doors

reviews.author: Aaron Misner
reviews.review: I've had some bad experiences in the past from previous property managers at Windermere, but recently a new rising star named Emma has helped turn things around.

reviews.author: Shani Greene
reviews.review: Had to give one star just write a review. But in reality this place gets negative Stars. This place is a joke and they act as if they care but in reality only cares about their paycheck and who they can scam out of money so their paycheck

reviews.author: Eunice Graves
reviews.review: My husband and I were moving from another state. We called, we had all the documents and a cosigner and still we kept getting rejected. We are now living in a residential hotel while I keep going to work as a nurse who tries to HELP people.

reviews.author: Lindsey Weedston
reviews.review: Don't even think about renting from them unless you can afford a lawyer. I tried to complain about the ridiculous amount they charged me to clean the carpets that were in unacceptable condition when I moved in (which I of course noted on

reviews.author: Michelle Frasu
reviews.review: This is the only rental company in Bellingham I recommend to friends.  Everything was always straight forward, maintenance was extremely prompt, and it is the only company in ten years that has given me a fair and timely refund of my deposit.  I genuinely wrote them a thank you note when I had to move!

reviews.author: Resa gipson
reviews.review: Ashely Ramos is the sweetest person ever! Always welcomes me by name and makes me feel comfortable. She has seen me through my journey of moving and has helped so much. Jay has also been very helpful. Helped me get into my place when I didnt think I could. Very grateful for them at Windermere!!

reviews.author: Rae Vena
reviews.review:
terrible!     do not rent from this company .   should have 0 stars.
They are extremely rude through email and through our phone conversation.and basically steal an expensive rental application fee from you!

reviews.author: Sways me
reviews.review: I have had an application in for over two weeks and I call/ go in person everyday due to the lack of communication. I'm not trying to be naggy, but every staff member has told me conflicting things regarding the process & how long it will

reviews.author: Todd Cherry
reviews.review: I've been renting with them for over 3 years there excellent ive never had problem getting through with them they've always worked with me I don't know what people are saying in the 3 years I've been with them they never were hard to get a hold of and the complex I live at is nice quiet and very comfortable

reviews.author: JM Schiss
reviews.review: Unprofessional...Lack of communication and willingness to address issues...While they have one of the strictest late fee policies out there (which I never was late), they do not even follow the law when it comes to the timeliness of

reviews.author: Anthony Casuccio
reviews.review: Paid 1800 dollar security deposit to be told the home owner no longer wanted to rent. Then when expressing I was upset because I cancelled my storage unit and missed out on other rentals the property manager got hostile on the phone with me. Super shady company. I will never give them my money again.

reviews.author: Lindsay Hicks
reviews.review: If you like to be harassed, have your questions ignored, fined for no reason, belittled, and lied to, go with Windermere! I have NEVER had one issue with any property managements before but they are a whole new level of psycho! Do yourself

ownerResponse.text:
Our customer service is very important to us and we value your feedback. Please contact our office so we may address your concerns directly.
Thank you

reviews.author: Dan Lamb
reviews.review: this company is encouraging other tenants and mexican painters to harass me and serving eviction threats to me all the while i'm the one who's being harassed by tenants who have lived here way shorter periods of time than i have. i'm highly

reviews.author: Sarah M.
reviews.review: When we stopped in town to look for rentals, I was astoundingly underwhelmed by the folks in their rental leasing office. She seemed busy, like we were bothering her more than anything else, and the fact that we had a pet made it even more

reviews.author: Angie Mccaslin
reviews.review: I am an condo owner....lived my place 10+ place paid for. Husband became ill and unable work. Got behind on dues kick us out our place. Husband and I and 2 six olds. Ended up settling hoa. No compassion very rude and will never use them sell our place.

reviews.author: Ryan Astle
reviews.review: Any time I need maintenance, or an appliance replacement in my apartment they come through promptly, with amazing quality. There's not a bad thing I could say about them.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for your feedback! We appreciate our tenants!

reviews.author: Alexis Newmark
reviews.review: Windermere has workers at their properties at all hours of the day, as early as 7 am, who yell and are loud and disrespectful. Sometimes they even harrass you. When you tell Windermere about the issue they will lie saying it will be done

ownerResponse.text:
Hello Alex,

We have received your recent review on Google and take these types of complaints  More

reviews.author: anni o
reviews.review: unhelpful, uncaring. the same as all other property management in bellingham unfortunately

reviews.author: Arielle Andler
reviews.review: This place is absurd.... you have to apply for an apartment before you can view it and the application fee is $45 and non refundable... which means you have to pay $45 just to see an apartment! What a scam!

ownerResponse.text:
Hello,
We apologize to hear that you had a negative experience.
Please note the policy of applying before viewing a unit was a COVID procedure  More

reviews.author: Joe Skar
reviews.review: The "no housing assistance accepted" blanket policy is hurting disadvantaged people in this extreme housing market. Despite guaranteed rent payments they outright refuse to accept "poor people" in their properties.

reviews.author: George Howe
reviews.review: They raised our rent by $75 last year. We are on disability. Boy, did we get the shaft.

reviews.author: Richard Huizenga
reviews.review: Working with Windermere has been delightful. We have been working together for years and it is always a great experience. They have exhibited great communication, flexibility and are always profession. Great job team

reviews.author: Mandy Reed
reviews.review: Okay here it goes..Yes windermere is good but my boyfriend and i were living in a stuido on northwest Ave way over priced for the stuido.And not knowing it was a bad area and..And mine and my boyfriends rent was going up to 775 then that

reviews.author: Robert Sullivan
reviews.review: Been working with them for years and they find me great tenants who all pay their rent on time, take care of their units and turn out to be long term.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for your positive feedback! We appreciate your business.

reviews.author: Bruce Shaw
reviews.review: Cori went above and beyond to help me with approval so as to keep me  from ending up homeless in the coming weeks... thankyou so much.. just in time  for the up coming season...

reviews.author: Michelle Kellogg
reviews.review: The doors were locked I was dropping of a deposit for a single mom so her and her boys could move in she'd been homeless and didnt have the $50 administrative fee so she could get the keys u would think at a time like this they would wave the fee

reviews.author: Rubn Dominguez
reviews.review:
Be careful be careful they has bad reputation.

Make sure you take pictures before and as you leave your rental place with Windermere Property Management. It is bad dishonest companie in town

reviews.author: Dan Hall
reviews.review:
Quiet and considerate neighbors.
The building is well maintained and one of the safest places Ive rented.
Never had an issue with WPM.

reviews.author: Iain Davidson
reviews.review: Friendly staff. Office currently closed to public. Park and call office (note on front door) and they will come to car to answer questions or give you forms to fill out. Drop box also available on side of building facing road.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you, Iain! :)

reviews.author: INMER YEPEZ
reviews.review: Very good attention, the super friendly girls all, I recommend you come to this place, very good everything, I was attended by Liz super good and kind person.

reviews.author: Leanne Smith
reviews.review: Jill does a great job managing our property and has given us advice and made suggestions that have saved us money.  We really appreciate the great service!

reviews.author: Ryan M.
reviews.review: I'm stuck using them through my Condo Association. They are TERRIBLE, anytime I call them. i.e ants inside, leaking windows. they say it is an inside issue, therefore it is my problem. HA! And they take my money for WHAT?

reviews.author: Kathryn Lockerbie
reviews.review: I'm the landlord.  they are helpful friendly and knowledgeable. Difficult to get a call back. From the person but when I get the call, they know their stuff and are very helpful

reviews.author: D Moon
reviews.review: Its been two weeks since I requested maintenance, and they havent even responded to give me a timeline for repair. Ive followed up by phone and email, and they just reply we will get back to you but they never do.

reviews.author: Cookie
reviews.review: Dont apply to rent from them if you have a husky they restrict against them and the information isnt easily accessible on their website or listings.

reviews.author: Karen Brown
reviews.review: Called 4 times and left messages.  No one ever returned my call.  They obviously dont want my business.  I wouldnt waste your time with them.

reviews.author: Aaron Allen
reviews.review: Wow. So disappointed. The lobby is closed so had to wait outside. They are closed mid day for lunch so had to go but twice and wait about 45 min for a key pickup. Friendly and perfessional staff.

reviews.author: doer3664
reviews.review: Would give 0 stars if I could. Horrible communication, lack of transparency in their management. The management team is not professional or knowledgeable.

reviews.author: Jordy Spaur
reviews.review: If I could give them no stars, I would. Total lack of communication, complete disrespect towards the renters, and have absolutely no sympathy for people who live 5 hours away.

reviews.author: Cori Robinson
reviews.review: Great, friendly service! Love the front desk gals!

reviews.author: Zach Dugan
reviews.review: Talked to Michelle today and she was great, very respectful and helped me resolve my issue.

reviews.author: Corvett Higdon
reviews.review: They try to be helpful even when there's no viable housing in this market

reviews.author: Craig Jackson
reviews.review: The food is good, but a little more on the pricey side.

reviews.author: STFUSN
reviews.review: The people where nice but they couldn't help us find a house they required too much stuff from us

ownerResponse.text: Thank you, we appreciate your feedback. Please let us know if we can be of further assistance and check out our website for our available rentals at RentalsbyWindermere.com

reviews.author: Javer Sandival
reviews.review: Gladly gave me info even though I wasnt even an applicant. Very polite!

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for the positive review!

reviews.author: howardarbutus
reviews.review: Terrible property manager.  I am an owner and I was horrified on how bad they were.  I don't have them working for  me any more.

reviews.author: Kianna Keck
reviews.review: I love Windermere for working with my family! Always so wonderful!

reviews.author: Alena Fletcher
reviews.review: The girls at this office are amazing!

reviews.author: Bellingham Store
reviews.review: By far the worst management company. 4 weeks since requesting service and no response. Class act over there.

reviews.author: Karen Hunt
reviews.review: Was checking for rentals but they only sell here in area.

reviews.author: Bradley Harp
reviews.review: Beautiful here

reviews.author: Sharon
reviews.review: Courteous, respectful and supportive staff.

reviews.author: Kristina Kovacic
reviews.review: This property management company sucks, just a bunch of slum lords

reviews.author: Julian Sibley
reviews.review: Worst property management company I have ever rented through

ownerResponse.text:
Thank you for your feedback. We would like to take this opportunity to respond to your comment.
We imagine your unfavorable review is written in response to the Deposit  More

Thank you for your feedback. Your concerns are important to us and we value our customers. Please contact our office so we can address your experience directly.
